name: Mecha Genesis: Tactics
description:
Mecha Genesis: Tactics A strategy game where you can push your enemies into things to deal more damage.

The game was originally developed for the GDU Jam #5 with the theme: "Use Enemies as Weapons"

🖱️ Controlls: Mouse.
⌨️ Keyboard shortcuts:
             1: Move
             2: Attack
             Esc: Deselect
             Space: End turn
📺 Plays best in fullscreen mode (icon at the bottom right corner)

Credits:

  • Dev and 2d art by Zizaco 
  • Music by Austen Kinney

Original Soundtrack:

Austen Kinney · Mecha Genesis: Tactics OST
